antibiotic therapy
• ct- vague low density lesions, without mass effect.
• mri- multiple lesions, hyperintense on non-contrast t1 scans
• diffuse  mild enhancement following contrast gd+ administration

• toxoplasmosis
29 year old mexican man with seizures.
hiv positive
